ygData.subject: Re: New Troll SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I m casting it with 90 Int as a L9 Human.  Go figure.  Make sure to dump a training point in each of the required magic skills at L9.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm casting it with 90 Int as a L9 Human. Go figure. Make sure to dump a
training point in each of the required magic skills at L9.

David wrote:

> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> My INT is 115 (Dark Elf) and I can barely cast it at L9. It looks like it
> sucks all of my mana out when I cast it.
>
> -Tenin - Tarew Marr
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jeremy(home)
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 8:18 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK
>
> My INT is about 80 (Human SK-Veeshan) and I couldn't summon at L9.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stuart Christian <stuartc@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 6:08 PM
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK
>
> I'm switching to the Rallos Zek server to kill a few of those goodie goodies
> and am wondering what my INT has to be to cast leering corpse at level 10?
> My troll now on E'ci is level 10, almost level 11, and still can't it and I
> don't want to make this mistake again. I believe my INT is around 62 on
> E'ci. Thanks
>
> -Stu
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Star Wars fans are using ONElist to share the fun.
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Are you?
